Text: Two Years in VideoIts Party TimeIMAGE Dear Amazon Video Customer IMAGEIMAGE As one of our loyal Video customers you might like to know that our Amazoncom Video store is two years old this month And since youve helped us get where we are today consider yourself cordially invited to the party Our Second Anniversary Store features stellar videos at savings of up to through November IMAGEIMAGEIMAGE As Porkys quote implies our selection is truly out of this world Our editors have gathered an exceptional array of cantmiss videosfrom classics to scifi action to yoga theres something for video lovers of all tastes Our customers have also helped decorate our Second Anniversary Store Youll find over a dozen lists of customer favoritesall top sellers from the last two years Its an incredibly diverse selection from hilarious spoofs like Galaxy Quest to fascinating histories like The Civil War A Ken Burns Film So drop by our Second Anniversary Store and help us celebrate two years of great videos Youll save up to on our deals of the weeknow thats a happy bbbirthday We look forward to seeing you Sincerely IMAGE Jason Kilar General Manager DVD Video Amazoncom PS Currently prolonging my recent vacation in Italy by watching Roman Holiday and Cinema Paradiso We hope you enjoyed receiving this message However if youd rather not receive any future emails of this sort from Amazoncom please visit your Amazoncom account wwwamazoncomyouraccount page Under the Your Account Settings heading click the Update your communication preferences link Please note that this message was sent to the following email address

Remember Your Savings on DVDs and CDsIMAGE IMAGE DVD Classics IMAGE DVD Top Sellers IMAGE DVD Boxed Sets Dear Amazon Customer Recently you received a mailer from us with a special offer at our DVD and Music stores for off your next DVD or CD purchase If youve already taken advantage of these savings were glad your player wont be going hungry any longer IMAGE If you havent youd better hurrythe offer ends January Youll find just about all the DVDs and CDs you could ever want and we even have an option that lets you preorder titles before theyre released So stop by today Then feast away and save on your next DVD or CD purchase before January IMAGE Jason Kilar General Manager DVD Video Amazoncom IMAGE Music Videos on DVD IMAGE Soundtrack CDs IMAGE Jazz CDs PS We hope you enjoyed receiving this message However if youd rather not receive future emails of this sort from Amazoncom please visit your Amazoncom account page Under the Your Account Settings heading click the Update your communication preferences link Dont delete This is your Amazoncom promotional certificate Amount off at the Amazoncom DVD and Music stores Claim Code DVGRKENEHXYQWL Expires January This code is the same as the one printed on the original announcement we sent you in the mail If youve already taken advantage of this offer please note this code can be used only once To redeem your promotional certificate simply Go to the DVD or Music store Select the DVDs andor CDs you want and add them to your Shopping Cart Please use our Shopping Cart rather than ordering with Click to successfully redeem your certificate Click the Proceed to checkout button At the Pay section of the progress bar youll see a box on the lower part of the page that says Do you have a gift certificate or promotional claim code Enter your claim code in the space provided to redeem your promotional certificate Then click the Continue button and complete the order form Youll know you have placed your order when you reach a screen that says Thank you for your order We will send you an email confirmation shortly If you wish to review the details of your order click on the appropriate links in the Managing your order box or the Your Account link in the upper right corner of the page Limit one per customer Offer not valid with other promotional offers Offer must be redeemed at dvd or music toward the purchase of products sold by Amazoncom and listed in Amazoncoms online DVD and music catalogs Offer cannot be redeemed at Amazoncouk Amazonde or any other Web site affiliates Offer is not valid at Amazoncom Auctions or zShops Offer cash value is th of one cent and is not for resale Offer must be applied at the time of the order and cannot be applied to orders already placed with us You must pay for the balance with a credit card This offer expires at pm PST on January If you have any questions send us email at Please note that this message was sent to the following email address
